overview: Pusit is having the worst day of his life. He just lost his job and is in serious debt. That is all about to change when he receives a mysterious phone call with a tempting offer. If he could complete 13 tasks, he will win 100 million Baht. Pusit agrees and the game begins.
tagline: 13 Challenges. $100 Million. How Far Would You Go?
title: 13: Game of Death
